v0.0.4
 - Add CLI (only core). Usage: python -mfiledict --help.
 - Add tests CLI. Usage: python -mfiledict.test.
 - Keys list now can be passed to BaseStorage.values & BaseShardedStorage.values.

 - Add tests to package.
